Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.messagebundle.i18n

[Java] Interface I18nMessageBundleProvider

  • Privides I18nMessageBundle by name. Name of message bundle is like following: 'com.jcatalog.bundleName'.

    Authors:
    Roman Denisyuk

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        I18nMessageBundle getI18nMessageBundle(java.lang.String bundleName)
        Returns message I18nMessageBundle implementation by it name and for specified locale.

    • Method Detail

      • public I18nMessageBundle getI18nMessageBundle(java.lang.String bundleName)

        Returns message I18nMessageBundle implementation by it name and for specified locale.

        Parameters:
        bundleName - name of a message bundle for example: 'com.jcatalog.bundleName'
        Returns:
        I18nMessageBundle. Message bundle with specified name should be exist.
